entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
